subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kemba Walker, the ninth pick in this year’s N.B.A. draft after leading Connecticut to the N.C.A.A. championship, signed with the Charlotte Bobcats.
snippet: Kemba Walker, the ninth pick in this year’s N.B.A. draft after leading Connecticut to the N.C.A.A. championship, signed with the Charlotte Bobcats.
